sections.title: ABOUT
items: Kids are fun, technology is fantastic, and we truly love to bring them together. We believe that a right blend of technology and creativity can create such products which can not only make learning fun for kids, but also open new dimensions to kids’ perception towards education.
On parenting front, we truly value the heart space and have an aim of fostering a deeper more nurturing connection between kids and their parents through research in technology platforms.
Our products include a suite of nice & innovative applications, designed specifically for kids. They are available on various platforms, including iOS, Android and Windows store.
We also work laterally with schools and parents to understand their needs, while upholding high standards of professionalism and quality service through our products.

sections.title: CORE VALUES
items: Honesty, integrity and ethics in all aspects of business
Contribution and responsibility, both technical and non-technical, to the communities in which we operate.
People are number 1 – treat them well, expect a lot more, rest will follow.
Respect and opportunity for individual initiative and personal growth.
Fanatical attention to consistency and detail; seek superiority in all we undertake.

sections.title: PHILOSOPHY
items: Our team of passionate technology professionals and creative minds strive to provide real world solutions to today’s parenting challenges by empowering parents and engaging kids.

sections.title: FOUNDERS
items: Greysprings' founding team is from IITs and NITs. Overall team has more than 70+ years experience in cutting edge technologies.

sections.title: MISSION
items: To revolutionize education with the help of technology making it simple, experiential and available for masses.

sections.title: Developer
summary: SDEs are smart creative with passion for building software products. They are part of team who would own components of big software products.

We need versatile engineers who are ready to tackle new problems as we scale our software products suite. Join us to be a part of a fast paced start up where people live code every jiffy spent at work.
qualification: Pursuing or completed Bachelor’s, Master’s or Ph.D. degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related field
Strong computer science fundamentals
1-2 years of experience programming in C++, Java or other computer programming languages preferred
Strong technical prowess, including understanding of algorithms, systems architecture
Ability to derive creative and innovative solutions by thinking "outside the box"
Familiarity with web based components and platforms such as Android, iOS, Windows8, WP8 is added advantage

summary: You would be joining the team who is building games for kids in the range of 2-8 years. These games are designed keeping learning in mind. You would be required to code in C++/C#/Python/Java/Objective C. All these applications are targeted for iOS, Android, Amazon, Windows 8 and Windows Phone8 platforms. As part of team you would get exposure to Gaming frameworks, Cocos2d, Azure, Databases and web technologies

sections.title: Developer Intern
summary: In Greysprings, interns start right away with live projects and deliverables. Internship experience at Greysprings is not less than a full semester of learning in college. It is common to have 5-6 product releases for a team of 4 people in a month. You will work as team member of one such team. Most likely, you would see your work live with customers in less than a month.
Join us to be a part of fast paced start up where people live code every jiffy spent at work.
qualification: Pursuing a degree in Computer Science from reputed institutes such as IIT, NIT, DCE
Strong computer science fundamentals
Familiarity programming in C/C++/Java
Good computer science fundamentals. Especially Data structures and Algorithm
Strong technical prowess, including understanding of algorithms, systems architecture
Ability to derive creative and innovative solutions by thinking “outside the box”

summary: Multi-platform (iOS, Android, WP8, Windows, Amazon) game development. Proficiency in coding is highly desired.  As part of role, you will be required to write code in C++/C#/Java. During internship you’ll get exposure to Azure, XML, JSON, Databases, SQL,  Fiddler and web technologies.
